feed.title: Lychee Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v6.6.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • Translations update from LycheeOrg - Weblate by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3376
  • Remove "unjustified" photo layout option from code by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3374
  • Revert part of #3373 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3377
  • Drop legacy id by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3375
  • Remove dependency on parent-id and directly extract from the url by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3355
  • Fix 500 when the imagick config file does not exists by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3386
  • Dutch translations by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3387
  • Add hint to discussion template that they should update Lychee by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3392
  • Fix discussions by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3394
  • Reorder in discussions by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3395
  • Translations update from LycheeOrg - Weblate by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3380
  • Arabic support by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3396
  • Translations update from LycheeOrg - Weblate by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3397
  • Add copilot instructions by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3390
  • Compact left menu by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3389
  • Fix various issues on Search by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3388
  • Translations update from LycheeOrg - Weblate by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3400
  • Composer update + fix phpstan error by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3410
  • Add option to disable slideshow by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3383
  • Add registration page by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3384
  • Add localization for user-groups by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3406
  • Add option to override the album visibility for smart and tag albums by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3379
  • Add color extraction from pictures. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3409
  • Fix user factory uniqueness problem by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3421
  • Refactoring LiveMetrics to avoid photo.album_id requirement. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3356
  • Translations update from LycheeOrg - Weblate by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3422
  • Minor documentation improvements by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3426
  • Refactoring photo-album relation by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3359
  • Version 6.6.6 üòà by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3436

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.6.5...v6.6.6

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v6.6.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • Remove unused config options, fix buttons in gallery header by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3439
  • Fix missing album (from) argument on download by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3443
  • Fix preloading of relation missing on Tag albums by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3445
  • Fix 500 on search by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3441
  • Version 6.6.7 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3444

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.6.6...v6.6.7

entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v6.6.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • Do not use metrics on smart albums by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3456
  • Check Imagick version 7 in diagnostics. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3455
  • fix: set header from album edit by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3461
  • chore: Version 6.6.9 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3468

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.6.8...v6.6.9

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v6.6.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • Fix path traversal attack + bump version. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3469

Thanks

We would like to thank @MrRauL124 for reporting this vulnerability to us.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.6.9...v6.6.10
